name: ANIMARAMA
description:
Introducing ANIMARAMA, a wildly illogical and satirical game that will make you nervous! ANIMARAMA is a game where you meet John Henry Stickman, Sir Paul Henry Stickman, Mr. Pinky from South Park, help a Mexican boy with no special talents, save the house from the flood, feed the pig, clean the toilet, face overeating, find the money cat , try to help Stickman save the Titanic, witness a nuclear explosion (a fallout shelter won't help you)... and much more.

ANIMARAMA is an adventure with fast action, challenging puzzles and unexpected twists - it's the ultimate gaming experience for thrill seekers and adventurers alike! Discard logic and common sense and just play!
